phases.name: v1.0.0 - Production Ready
phases.description: Production-ready PRD generation with quality scoring and revision loops

items.title: 16 PRD agent specifications
items.description: Define all agents: prd-lead, problem-discovery, user-research, market-intel, solution-ideation, requirements, ux-journey, tech-feasibility, metrics-success, risk-compliance, review-board, prd-scoring, exec-explainability, issue-extractor, revision-planner, change-validator

items.title: Team specification with DAG workflow
items.description: prd-team.json with 16 agents, DAG workflow, inputs/outputs, orchestrator

items.title: Agent instruction markdown files
items.description: Detailed prompts with YAML frontmatter for each agent

items.title: Code generation via agentkit
items.description: agentkit generate command creates Cobra CLI from multi-agent-spec

items.title: Generated Cobra CLI structure
items.description: run, resume, agent run/list, prereqs check, creds check, describe, respond commands

items.title: Markdown agent parsing
items.description: Parse agent specs from markdown files with YAML frontmatter

items.title: CLI prerequisite validation
items.description: Check required CLI tools (gh, git, jq) before execution

items.title: Credential validation via omnivault
items.description: Validate credentials using omnivault URI resolution (env://, op://, aws-sm://)

items.title: AI assistant discovery command
items.description: describe team --json outputs structured info for AI assistants

items.title: Human-in-the-loop respond command
items.description: respond command for providing human input to paused workflows

items.title: HITL state management
items.description: StepWaitingHITL status, HITLRequest/Response in execution state

items.title: PRD types from structured-requirements
items.description: Use grokify/structured-requirements as source of truth for PRD/MRD/TRD types via type aliases

items.title: 10-category PRD scoring
items.description: Score PRDs across problem definition, solution fit, user understanding, market awareness, scope discipline, requirements quality, metrics quality, UX coverage, technical feasibility, risk management

items.title: PRD view generation
items.description: Generate PM view and Executive view with markdown rendering

items.title: Persona library for reusable personas
items.description: PersonaLibrary type with CRUD, import/export between library and PRDs, usage tracking

items.title: prdtool CLI for PRD management
items.description: Commands: init, show, validate, score, add (problem, persona, goal, solution, requirement, risk, decision)

items.title: MCP server for PRD operations
items.description: Model Context Protocol server exposing PRD CRUD via mcpkit/runtime

items.title: Persona library CLI commands
items.description: prdtool persona list/add/show/import/export commands for managing persona library

items.title: File intake and parsing
items.description: Import existing docs, research, notes and extract PRD data automatically

items.title: Scoring-driven gap analysis
items.description: Map low category scores to specific questions for each agent domain

items.title: Interactive question session
items.description: Agent-led Q&A to fill PRD gaps based on scoring analysis

items.title: Score-question-update iteration loop
items.description: Iterate until PRD score reaches approval threshold (>=8.0)

items.title: Workflow orchestrator
items.description: Coordinate intake -> score -> question -> update -> repeat flow

items.title: OmniLLM client integration
items.description: Multi-provider LLM client (Anthropic, OpenAI, Gemini, xAI, Ollama)

items.title: Embedded agent implementation
items.description: EmbeddedAgent struct with Invoke method for in-process execution

items.title: DAG workflow executor
items.description: Execute workflow steps based on dependency graph with parallelism

items.title: Tool implementations
items.description: Read, Write, Glob, Grep, Shell tool implementations

items.title: Execution state persistence
items.description: FileStateBackend for resumable workflows

items.title: Kiro CLI integration
items.description: Documentation and examples for using prd-cli with Kiro

items.title: Claude Code integration
items.description: Plugin structure for Claude Code marketplace

items.title: Cursor integration
items.description: Documentation and examples for using prd-cli with Cursor

items.title: Interactive HITL mode
items.description: Synchronous stdin/stdout prompting for human input

items.title: Automated revision loops
items.description: Iterative PRD improvement based on review feedback

items.title: PRD output templates
items.description: Configurable output formats (Markdown, JSON, Notion, Confluence)

items.title: PRD metrics dashboard
items.description: Track PRD quality metrics over time

items.title: Multi-user collaboration
items.description: Support multiple humans providing HITL input

items.title: Rename structured-prd to structured-requirements
items.description: Renamed grokify/structured-prd to grokify/structured-requirements for broader applicability

content.value: PRD Agent Team is a multi-agent system for creating, reviewing, scoring, and iteratively improving Product Requirements Documents (PRDs). It uses 16 specialized agents coordinated via DAG workflow to produce high-quality PRDs with automated revision loops.
The system consists of multiple layers:

items: **structured-requirements**: Core PRD/MRD/TRD types, scoring, views, persona library (grokify/structured-requirements)
**Multi-Agent Spec**: Platform-agnostic agent and team definitions in JSON/Markdown
**agentkit**: Code generator that produces standalone Cobra CLIs from specs
**prdtool**: CLI for PRD management (init, show, validate, score, add)
**prdtool-mcp**: MCP server for AI assistant integration

content.value: This architecture allows the CLI to be used by any AI assistant (Kiro, Claude Code, Cursor) that can execute shell commands or connect via MCP.
The planned workflow for PRD creation:

items: **1. Intake**: Import existing docs or start interactive Q&A
**2. Score**: Run 10-category scoring to identify gaps
**3. Question**: Agent-led questions for weak categories
**6. Output**: Generate PRD.json, PM view, Exec view

content.value: The 16 agents are organized into phases:

version_history.summary: Multi-agent spec with 16 agents and DAG workflow
CLI generation via agentkit with HITL support
PRD types from structured-requirements, scoring, views, prdtool CLI, MCP server, persona library
Agent workflow: intake, scoring-driven Q&A, iteration loop
AI assistant integration (Kiro, Claude Code, Cursor)
